anya-e0807n2:2_0: Tattha ekampi atthaṁ kammādivasena ekattādivasena ca vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, syādayo.
anya-e0807n2:6_0: Jāti kriyā guṇo dabbaṁ, tathā nāmanti pañcadhā;
anya-e0807n2:15_0: Ettha paṭo sukkoti vinassanasabhāvo ca casaddena vipulo ākāsoti avinassanasabhāvo ca attani visuṁ guṇarahito guṇo+ccate tyattho.
anya-e0807n2:16_0: Yaṁ yaṁ visessate kiñci, taṁ taṁ dabba+miho+ccate;
anya-e0807n2:18_0: Ettha gojāti assajātīti vutte jāti dabbaṁ. Nīlo guṇoti ca guṇo dabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:18_1: Pacanakriyāti ca gamanādikriyāto visesiyatīti kriyāva dabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:20_0: Nāmanti taṁ yathā citto, saññā saddo tu taddhanī.
anya-e0807n2:22_0: Ayaṁ pañcavidhopi attho saddattho ceva sāmatthiyā gamyamānattho cāti dubbidho.
anya-e0807n2:22_1: Tathā hi ‘‘pīno divā na bhuñjeyya’’miti bhuttinirākati saddattho.
anya-e0807n2:25_0: Mukhyo tu nirantaratthe, lakkhaṇo tu tirohite;
anya-e0807n2:30_0: Vacco lakkhaṇiko byaṅgyo, cevaṁ saddo suvācako;
anya-e0807n2:33_0: Ti āmantaṇādhike atthamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Bho nara, bho itthi, bho napuṁsaka.
anya-e0807n2:36_0: Kriyā nimittaṁ kārakantu kamma, kattu, karaṇa, sampadāna, avadhi, ādhārabhedena chabbidhaṁ, taṁ yathā –
anya-e0807n2:38_1: tasmiṁ kammakārake dutiyāvibhatti hoti. Taṁ tividhaṁ nibbatti, vikati, patti bhedena,
anya-e0807n2:38_2: tattha nibbattikamme mātā puttaṁ vijāyati, āhāro sukhaṁ janayati, kaṭaṁ karoti datto.
anya-e0807n2:38_3: Vikatiyaṁ kaṭṭha+maṅgāraṁ karoti, suvaṇṇaṁ kaṭakaṁ karoti, vīhayo lunāti.
anya-e0807n2:38_4: Pattiyaṁ datto gharaṁ pavisati, ādiccaṁ passati, dhammaṁ suṇāti, paṇḍite payirupāsati.
anya-e0807n2:42_0: Kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ dassanīyanti attheva guṇayuttassa kammatā, vipulaṁ karoti,
anya-e0807n2:42_2: Odano paccateti odanasaddato kammatā nappatīyate, kiñcarahi ākhyātato.
anya-e0807n2:43_0: Icchitakammaṁ yathā-gāvuṁ payo dohati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ yācati, gāva+mava rundhati vajaṁ, māṇavakaṁ maggaṁ pucchati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ bhikkhate, rukkha+mavacināti phalāni, rukkhātyattho. Sissaṁ dhammaṁ brūte. Ettha payo, gāvaṁ iccādi icchitaṁ, gāvuṁ, gomanta+miccādi anicchitaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:43_1: Eva+manicchitepi kaṇṭakaṁ maddati, visaṁ gilati. Yaṁ nevi+cchitaṁ, nāpi anicchitaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:44_0: Ādhāre adhisi+ṭhā+sānaṁ payoge ca, pathaviṁ adhisessati, gāma+madhitiṭṭhati, rukkha+majjhāsateti.
anya-e0807n2:44_1: Ettha pathavinti pathaviyanti attho. Eva+mabhi, nipubbavisassāpi, dhamma+mabhinivisate, dhamme vā. Tathā upa, nva+jjhā+pubbavasatissa, gāma+mupavasati, gāma+manuvasati, vihāra+madhivasati, gāma+māvasati, agāraṁ ajjhavasati, ettha gāmanti gāmetyattho. Tathā tappānā+cārepi, nadiṁ pibati, gāmaṁ carati, nadiyaṁtyattho.
anya-e0807n2:44_2: Sace maṁ nālapissatīti mayā saddhiṁtyattho. Vihitāva paṭi-yogepi dutiyā,
anya-e0807n2:44_4: tampaṭi bojjhaṅgā bhāsantūti attho. Upamā maṁ patibhāti , upamā maṁ upaṭṭhātityattho.
anya-e0807n2:46_0: Kāladdhānaṁ dabba+guṇa+kriyāhi accantasaṁyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi dutiyā hoti. Kāle-sattāhaṁ gavapānaṁ, māsaṁ maṁsodanaṁ, saradaṁ ramaṇīyā nadī,
anya-e0807n2:46_1: sabbakālaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ nandanaṁ, tayo māse abhidhammaṁ deseti. Addhani-yojanaṁ vanarāji, yojanaṁ dīgho pabbato, kosaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0807n2:47_1: imaṁ rattiṁ cattāro mahārājānoti evamādīsu kālavācīhi accantasaṁyoge dutiyā,
anya-e0807n2:49_0: Gatyatthānaṁ bodhatthānaṁ āhāratthānaṁ saddatthāna+makammakānaṁ bhajjādīnañca payojje kattari dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0807n2:49_1: Datto gamayati māṇavakaṁ gāmaṁ, yāpayati vā.
anya-e0807n2:49_2: Guru bodhayati māṇavakaṁ dhammaṁ, vedayati vā.
anya-e0807n2:49_4: Guru ajjhāpayati sissaṁ vedaṁ, pāṭhayati vā.
anya-e0807n2:49_5: Payojjato+ññatra kamme dutiyā. Poso āsayati dattaṁ, sāyayati vā. Poso aññaṁ bhajjāpeti, aññaṁ koṭṭāpeti, aññaṁ santharāpeti.
anya-e0807n2:51_0: Harādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā. Poso hāreti bhāraṁ dattaṁ, datteneti vā. Dassayate janaṁ rājā, janeneti vā. Abhivādayate guruṁ dattaṁ, datteneti vā. Ajjhohāreti sattuṁ dattaṁ, datteneti vā. Kāreti datto dattaṁ, datteneti vā.
anya-e0807n2:53_0: Khādādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0807n2:53_1: Gatyatthādīsu kvaci paṭisedhattha+midaṁ. Khādayati datto dattena, ādayati dattena, avhāpayati datthena, saddāyayati dattena, nāyayati dattena, kandayati dattena.
anya-e0807n2:55_0: Dhiādīhi yuttato dutiyā hoti. Dhi+ratthu+maṁ putikāyaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:55_1: antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nālandaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:55_2: rājagahassa ca nālandassa ca vivarabhūte majjheti attho. Samādhāna+mantarena, mucalinda+mabhito saraṁ. Chaṭṭhyatthe+yaṁ dutiyā.
anya-e0807n2:57_0: Lakkhaṇādīsva+tthesu abhinā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Rukkha+mabhivijjotate cando, ettha rukkho lakkhaṇaṁ, cando lakkhitabbo,
anya-e0807n2:57_1: tatra abhinā rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā pakāsīyatīti rukkho abhinā yutto nāma.
anya-e0807n2:57_4: Rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁabhi vijjotate cando, rukkhe rukkhetyattho.
anya-e0807n2:59_0: Patiparīhi yuttato lakkhaṇādīsu bhāge ca+tthe dutiyā hoti. Rukkhaṁpati vijjotate, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁpati,
anya-e0807n2:59_1: rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁpati tiṭṭhati, ya+dettha maṁ pati siyā, yo mama bhāgo, so dīyatutyattho. Evaṁ rukkhaṁparityādipi.
anya-e0807n2:61_0: Lakkhaṇādīsu dutiyā. Rukkhamanu vijjotate, saccakiriya+manu vassi, hetu ca lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātara+manu,
anya-e0807n2:61_1: rukkhaṁ rukkha+manu vijjotate, yadettha maṁanu siyā.
anya-e0807n2:63_0: Sahatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Pabbata+manu tiṭṭhati, pabbatena saha tyattho.
anya-e0807n2:67_0: Hīnatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā. Upasāriputtaṁ paññavanto.
anya-e0807n2:69_0: Kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyā hoti. Jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā daṭṭho naro.
anya-e0807n2:69_1: Yattha kāraṇakāraṇampi kāraṇavasena vuccati, tatthāpi tatiyā, corehi gāmo daḍḍho, tiṇehi bhattaṁ siddhaṁ, saddhehi kāritā vihārā.
anya-e0807n2:71_0: Apayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0807n2:72_1: yathā hatthena kammaṁ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, manasā dhammaṁ viññāyati. Dattena vihayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṁ jhāpeti.
anya-e0807n2:75_1: gottena gotamo iccādi bhūdhātussa sambhavā karaṇe tatiyā.
anya-e0807n2:75_2: Tathā sāriputtoti nāmena vissuto, jātiyā khattiyo buddho, jātiyā sattavassiko, sippena naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṁso vayasā, evaṁ samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṁ kiṇāti.
anya-e0807n2:77_1: Tatiyāpi chaṭṭhīva appadhāne eva bhavati. Puttena sahā+gato, puttena saddhiṁ āgato, vitakkena saha vattati, puttena saha thūlo,
anya-e0807n2:77_2: nisīdi bhagavā saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṁ mitā,
anya-e0807n2:79_1: Bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭīvissake ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0807n2:79_2: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeyya,
anya-e0807n2:79_3: tidaṇḍakena paribbājaka+maddakkhi, akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.
anya-e0807n2:79_4: Tena hi vikalaṅgena vikalaṅgino vikāro lakkhiyate.
anya-e0807n2:81_0: Vāsādilakkhaṇakriyāya hetuto tatiyā. Annena vasati, vijjāya vasati, na jaccā vasalo hoti, kammunā vasalo hoti, dānena bhogavā, ācārena kulaṁ, tena pāṇi kāmadado.
anya-e0807n2:83_0: Iṇe hetumhi pañcamī vā. Satasmā baddho, satena vā.
anya-e0807n2:85_0: Paraṅgabhūte hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Jaḷattā baddho, jaḷattenavā, paññāya mutto, hutvā abhāvato aniccā,
anya-e0807n2:85_2: Bahulaṁvidhānā sattamyatthehipi, tena samayena, kālena dhammasākacchā, puratthimena dhataraṭṭho, dakkhiṇena virūḷhako, uttarena kapilavatthu, yena bhagavā, tenupasaṅkami, so vo mama+ccayena satthāti. Māsena bhuñjati, ekāheneva bārāṇasiṁ pāvisi,
anya-e0807n2:85_3: navahi māsehi vihāraṁ kārāpesi , kahāpaṇena ūno, dhanena vikalo, asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṁ, vācāya sakhilo, maṇinā attho, dhanena attho,
anya-e0807n2:85_4: yojanena gacchati iccādi hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā.
anya-e0807n2:85_5: Attanāva attānaṁ sammannatīti paccatte bahulaṁvidhānā kattari tatiyā.
anya-e0807n2:85_7: sumuttā mayaṁ tena mahāsamaṇenāti pañcamyatthe ca.
anya-e0807n2:87_0: Acetanaṁ sacetanaṁ vā paṭiggāhakabhāvenā+pekkhitaṁ, taṁ sampadānaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:87_1: tañca dā-dāneti dhātuto byappena yuttameva, tattha catutthī hoti.
anya-e0807n2:87_3: yathā buddhassa pupphaṁ deti, bodhirukkhassa jalaṁ deti, yācakassa dhanaṁ deti, bhikkhūnaṁ dānaṁ deti.
anya-e0807n2:90_1: saṅghe dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi, yā palālamayaṁ mālaṁ, nārī datvāna cetiyeti.
anya-e0807n2:92_0: Tādatthye catutthī siyā. Tadatthassa bhāve, tādatthyaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:92_2: Tadatthassa bhāvoti nimittanimittīsambandhe chaṭṭhī, tasmā chaṭṭhāpavādo+yaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:92_3: Samepi nimittanimittīnaṁ sambandhe nimittabhūtayūpatova catutthī, no nimittībhūtadāruto. Yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajati,
anya-e0807n2:92_4: buddhassatthāya jīvitaṁ pariccajāmi, neva davāya, na madāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā,
anya-e0807n2:92_5: atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattati, lokānukampāya, phāsu vihārāya.
anya-e0807n2:93_0: Iccāyaṁ kaccāyane upari vakkhamānassa catutthīti sādhitattā idha chaṭṭhīti dīpanatthaṁ vuccate –
anya-e0807n2:94_1: mā ayasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, khamati saṅghassa,
anya-e0807n2:94_2: bhatta+massa nacchādetīti chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāyaṁ, na ce+vaṁ virodho siyā, sadisarūpattā,
anya-e0807n2:95_0: Kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamā,
anya-e0807n2:95_1: kassa vā tuyhanti avatvā kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamāvasena byabhicāradassanā. Eva+maññāpi viññeyyā, paratopi yathāgamaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:96_0: Rañño sataṁ dhāreti rañño chattaṁ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhīva. Silāgha=kathane, evaṁ rañño silāghate iccādi, thutiṁ karotītyattho. Hanu=apanayane, rañño hanute, vañcetītyattho.
anya-e0807n2:96_1: Upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṁ vaḍḍhakī, upagaccheyyātyattho. Sapa=akkose, mayhaṁ sapate, saccaṁ kurutetyattho . Dhara=dhāraṇe, suvaṇṇaṁ te dhārayate, iṇaṁ te dhārayati, assa rañño nāgaṁ dhārayāma. Piha=icchāyaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:96_3: tesaṁ pihayanti sambuddhānaṁ satīmataṁ, pihayanti=patthenti. Tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadi+haṁ tassa pakuppeyyaṁ, dubhayati disānaṁ megho, yo mittānaṁ na dūbhati,
anya-e0807n2:96_4: yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati. Issa=issāyaṁ, titthiyā issayanti samaṇānaṁ. Usūya=dosāvikaraṇe,
anya-e0807n2:96_5: dujjanā guṇavantānaṁ ussūyanti, kā usuyā vijānataṁ.
anya-e0807n2:96_6: Idha+sidha+rādha+sādha=saṁsiddhiyaṁ, ārādho me rañño, rañño bhāgya+mārajjhati, kyā+haṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi,
anya-e0807n2:96_8: Bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū,
anya-e0807n2:96_10: sādhukāradānādinā taṁ ussahatītyattho. Ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, dhammaṁ te desissāmi,
anya-e0807n2:96_11: desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, niruttiṁ te pavakkhāmi, alaṁ me rajjaṁ, alaṁ bhikkhu pattassa, alaṁ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa, alaṁ te idha vāsena,
anya-e0807n2:96_12: kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇenāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n2:97_0: Evaṁ āyu bhoto hotu, ciraṁ jīvitaṁ, bhaddaṁ, kalyāṇaṁ, atthaṁ, payojanaṁ, kusalaṁ, anāmayaṁ, hitaṁ, patthaṁ, sukhaṁ, sātaṁ, bhoto hotu, sādhu sammuti me tassa,
anya-e0807n2:97_1: puttassā+vikareyya guyha+matthaṁ, tassa me sakko pāturahosi, tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṁ dūtaṁ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṁ āyogo ,
anya-e0807n2:97_2: ekassa dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā pahoti, upamaṁ te karissāmi, añjaliṁte paggaṇhāmi, tassa phāsu, lokassa+ttho, namo te purisājañña, sotthi tassa, samattho mallo mallassa, tassa hitaṁ, tassa sukhaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:97_3: svāgataṁ te mahārājāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n2:102_0: Yathā+ssā dhāvatā poso, pato, rukkhāphalanti ca.
anya-e0807n2:103_0: Tattha calāvadhi dhāvatā assā puriso patati,
anya-e0807n2:104_1: yattha apa apagamanakriyaṁ upāttaṁ=ajjhāhaṭaṁ visayaṁ katvā pavattati, taṁ upāttaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:104_2: Yaṁ kenaci guṇena ukkaṁsiyati, taṁ anumeyyaṁ. Yathā gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā, pāpā cittaṁ nivārenti. Valāhakā vijjotate, kusulato pacatīti. Ettha ca vaḷāhakā nikkhamma,
anya-e0807n2:107_0: Bhayahetumhi-corā bhayaṁ jāyati, taṇhāya jāyati bhayaṁ, pāpato uttasati, natthi soko kuto bhayaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:107_1: Akkhātari-upajjhāyā sikkhaṁ gaṇhāti, ācariyamhā adhīto suṇāti vā.
anya-e0807n2:107_2: Buddhasmā parājenti aññatitthiyā, parājitā bhavantītyattho. Himavatā pabhavati gaṅgā,
anya-e0807n2:107_3: aciravatiyā pabhavanti kunnadiyo. Urasmā jāto putto, kammato jātaṁ indriyaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:107_6: Dūratthayogekīvadūro ito naḷakāragāmo, tato have dūrataraṁ vadanti, gāmato nātidūre,
anya-e0807n2:107_8: ārakā tehi bhagavā dūratova namassanti, addasa dūratova āgacchantaṁ. Antikatthayoge-antikaṁ gāmā, āsannaṁ gāmā, samīpaṁ gāmā.
anya-e0807n2:107_12: ito vassasatasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissati. Pāsādā saṁkameyya,
anya-e0807n2:107_14: tathā hatthikkhandhā saṁkameyya, abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṁ sutvāti attho, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya.
anya-e0807n2:107_15: Disatthavācīhi yoge-ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, avīcito yāva bhavaggaṁ, uddhaṁ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā.
anya-e0807n2:107_16: Vibhajane-yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto tato varaṁ, kiñcāpi dānato sīlaṁ varaṁ, tato mayā bahutaraṁ sutaṁ, sīlameva sutā seyyo.
anya-e0807n2:107_17: Āratippayoge-ārati virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, adinnādānā paṭivirato, appaṭiviratā musāvādā.
anya-e0807n2:107_19: mātuto ca pituto ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho.
anya-e0807n2:107_20: Pamocanatthayoge-parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto+smi mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, mutto+haṁ+sabbapāsehi. Vivecane-vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi.
anya-e0807n2:107_22: gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:107_24: Pubbādiyoge-pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā, ito pubbe nāhosi,
anya-e0807n2:107_25: tato paraṁ paccantimā janapadā, tato aparena samayena. Pañhe-kuto+si tvaṁ, kuto bhavaṁ, pāṭaliputtato.
anya-e0807n2:107_27: kicchena me adhigatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā, evaṁ thokā mutto, thokena muttoti.
anya-e0807n2:110_0: Nyāyasiddhaṁ yato tasmā, tadatthaṁ na visuṁ vidhi.
anya-e0807n2:111_3: karotikriyāya sambandhena kammattañca sijjhatīti. Kara+bhūdhātavo ca –
anya-e0807n2:113_0: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṁ tesu gamyate –
anya-e0807n2:115_2: na sakkā anivattituṁ’’ti vuttattā aniṭṭhappasaṅgo na siyā. Mariyādāyaṁ-āpabbatā khettaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:117_0: Vajjane vattamānehī apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti. Apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, parisālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṁ vajjetvāti attho.
anya-e0807n2:119_0: Paṭinidhimhi patidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī hoti. Buddhasmā pati sāriputto,
anya-e0807n2:121_0: Ritesaddayoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Rite saddhammā, rite saddhammaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:123_0: Vinā+ññatrayoge nāmasmā tatiyā dutiyā pañcamī ca. Vinā vātena, vinā vātaṁ, vinā vātasmā.
anya-e0807n2:123_1: Aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena, aññatra dhammaṁ, aññatra dhammā.
anya-e0807n2:125_0: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca.
anya-e0807n2:125_1: Bhinnayogakaraṇaṁ dutiyānivattanatthaṁ. Puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, janasmā nānā.
anya-e0807n2:127_1: Rañño purisoti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti, puriso gaṇhāti, tasmā rājapurisoti viññāyati.
anya-e0807n2:127_2: Evameva yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa+samūhā+vayava+vikāra+kāriya+avatthā+jāti+guṇa+kriyādivasena vā, ṭhānīvasena vā, āgamīvasena vā,
anya-e0807n2:127_3: so tividhopi attho sambandho nāma. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n2:129_0: Sambandho nāma so attho, tattha chaṭṭhī vidhīyate.
anya-e0807n2:130_0: Pāratantyañhi sambandho, tattha chaṭṭhī bhave tito;
anya-e0807n2:132_1: Ettha ca brāhmaṇādisāmito nivattetīti rājā visesanaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:132_3: Bhaṇḍasambandhato-pahutaṁ me dhanaṁ sakka, ekassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṁ.
anya-e0807n2:132_4: Samīpato-ambavanassa avidūre, nibbānasseva santike. Samūhe-suvaṇṇassa rāsi, bhikkhūnaṁ samūho.
anya-e0807n2:132_5: Avayave-manussasseva te sīsaṁ, rukkhassa sākhā. Vikāre-suvaṇṇassa vikati, bhaṭṭhadhaññānaṁ sattu. Kāriye-yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṁ phalaṁ vipāko.
anya-e0807n2:132_6: Avatthāyaṁ-khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo, jarā, bhedo vā. Jātiyaṁ-manussassa bhāvo, manussānaṁ jāti. Guṇe-suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo,
anya-e0807n2:132_7: vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa buddhassa guṇaghoso, pupphānaṁ gandho, phalānaṁ raso, cittassa phusanā, sippikānaṁ sataṁ natthi, tilānaṁ muṭṭhi, tesaṁ samāyogo, sandhino vimokkho,
anya-e0807n2:132_8: tathāgatassa paññāpāramiṁ ārabbha, sukhaṁ te, dukkhaṁ te, cetaso parivitakko udapādi, paññāya paṭubhāvo, rūpassa lahutā, mudutā vā, upacayo vā.
anya-e0807n2:132_9: Kriyāsambandhe-pādassa ukkhepanaṁ, avakkhepanaṁ vā, hatthassa samiñjanaṁ, dānaṁ, pasāraṇaṁ, dhātūnaṁ gamanaṁ, ṭhānaṁ, nisajjā, sayanaṁ vā, tathāgatassa nāmagottādi, tassa kāraṇaṁ, tassa mātāpitaro, tassa purato pāturahosi, nagarassa dakkhiṇato, vassānaṁ tatiye māse, na tassa upamā, kuverassa bali iccādi. Api ca –
anya-e0807n2:133_0: Gāvassa jāti, dhavalo, gati, siṅgaṁ, nāmanti+dha;
anya-e0807n2:134_0: Dabbassāpi ca jātyādi, visessā honti kāmato.
anya-e0807n2:137_0: Ṭhānito-yuvaṇṇāna+meo luttā. Āgamito-suña sassa. Sāmiyoge-devāna+mindo, migānaṁ rājā.
anya-e0807n2:137_2: mahāsenāpatīnaṁ ujjhāpetabbaṁ, rajakassa vatthaṁ dadāti, musāvādassa ottappaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n2:137_3: Yajassa yoge-pupphassa buddhassa yajati, pupphenātyattho. Evaṁ ghatassa aggiṁ juhati.
anya-e0807n2:137_4: Suhitatthe-pattaṁ odanassa pūretvā, pūraṁ nānāpakārassa asucino, pūraṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa.
anya-e0807n2:137_5: Kitakappayoge-bahulaṁvidhānā chaṭṭhī, rañño sammato, pūjito, sakkato, apacito, mānito vā,
anya-e0807n2:137_7: yesaṁ kāyagatā sati aparibhuttā, sādhusammato bahujanassa,
anya-e0807n2:137_8: suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṁ dhammadhātu, dhammassa gutto medhāvī.
anya-e0807n2:137_9: Kammatthe-tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro, amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṁ sandhātā, sahitānaṁ anuppadātā, bodhetā pajāya, kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṁvādako lokassa,
anya-e0807n2:137_10: catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya pasādo. Sarati+cchāyoge-mātu sarati, na tesaṁ koci sarati, sattānaṁ kammapaccayā, puttassa icchati.
anya-e0807n2:137_11: Karotissa (yoge) – udakassa patikurute, kaṇḍassa patikurute, abhisaṅkharotītyattho.
anya-e0807n2:137_14: kinnu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno,
anya-e0807n2:139_0: Tulyatthena yoge vā chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā ca. Pitu tulyo, pitarā vā, mātu tulyo, mātarā vā.
anya-e0807n2:141_0: Kattukammaṭṭhānaṁ nisajja+pacanādikriyānaṁ yo ādhāro, taṁ ādhārakārakaṁ nāma.
anya-e0807n2:141_1: Kathaṁ kaṭe nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati,
anya-e0807n2:141_2: devadatta+taṇḍulānaṁ kattu+kammānaṁ dhāraṇato tadaṭṭhaāsana+pacanakriyaṁ kaṭa+thāliyo dhārenti nāma, tasmiṁ sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0807n2:142_0: So byāpiko, opasilesiko, vesayiko, sāmīpikoti catubbidho.
anya-e0807n2:142_1: Tattha yo ādheyyassa nissesādhārabhūto, so byāpiko, yathā tilesu telaṁ atthi, khīresu jalaṁ, dadhimhi sappi.
anya-e0807n2:142_2: Paccekasiddhānaṁ bhāvānaṁ yaṁ ādheyyabhāvena upasilesanaṁ allīyanaṁ atthi, so opasilesiko. Yathā āsane nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati, ghaṭe udaka+matthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhito.
anya-e0807n2:142_3: Yattha samīpe samīpīvohāraṁ katvā tadāyattatādīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvo upacarīyati, taṁ sāmīpikaṁ, yathā gaṅgāyaṁ ghoso, gaṅgāya samīpe vajotyattho.
anya-e0807n2:142_5: Yattha aññathābhāvavasena desantarāvacchedavasena vā ādhāraparikappo , so vesayito. Yathā ākāse sakuṇā caranti, bhūmiyaṁ manussā, jale macchā, pāsādesu patito, pāpasmiṁ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye nipuṇo, mātari sādhu, pitari nipuṇo.
anya-e0807n2:146_0: Sāmīpiko tu gaṅgādi, ākāso visayo mato.
anya-e0807n2:148_0: Nimittatthe sattamī hoti. Ajinamhi haññate dīpi, kuñjaro dantesu haññate,
anya-e0807n2:148_1: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṁ. Sabbattha nimityattho.
anya-e0807n2:150_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, tato sattamī. Kāle gāvīsu duyhamānāsugato, duddhāsu āgato.
anya-e0807n2:150_2: āgamanakriyāya duddhākriyācihanaṁ, eva+muparipi. Pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato,
anya-e0807n2:150_3: jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṁ dasasahassī lokadhātu sampakampi.
anya-e0807n2:153_0: Imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti iccādi. ‘‘Akāle vassatī tassa,
anya-e0807n2:155_1: tato chaṭṭhī hoti sattamī cā+nādare gamyamāne.
anya-e0807n2:155_2: Akāmakānaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ rudantānaṁ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu vā. ‘‘Ākoṭayanto so neti, sivirājassa pekkhate’’, ‘‘maccu ādāya gacchati, pekkhamāne mahājane’’.
anya-e0807n2:156_0: Gunnaṁ sāmīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, gosu sāmīti visayasattamī. Evaṁ gunnamissaro, gosvi+ssaro, gunnaṁ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gunnaṁ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gunnaṁ sakkhī, gosu sakkhī, gunnaṁ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gunnaṁ pasuto, gosu pasuto, kusalā naccagītassa, kusalā naccagīte, āyutto kaṭakaraṇassa, āyutto kaṭakaraṇe.
anya-e0807n2:156_1: Tathā ādhāravacanicchāyaṁ sattamī, bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, bāhāsu gahetvā, hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti, ñāṇasmiṁ pasanno,
anya-e0807n2:158_0: Jātiguṇakriyāhi samudāyate+kadesassa puthakkaraṇaṁ niddhāraṇaṁ, yato taṁ karīyati, tato chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti.
anya-e0807n2:160_0: Ādhikye atthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Upakhāriyaṁ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikotyattho. Tathā upanikkhe kahāpaṇaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:162_0: Sāmibhāvatthe adhinā yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Adhibrahmadatte pañcālā, adhipañcālesu brahmadatto,
anya-e0807n2:163_0: Ettha ca yathāvuttesu atthesu ayaṁ bhedo –
anya-e0807n2:164_0: Kārakaṁ sādhakaṁ nibbattakaṁ kriyānimittanti atthato ekameva, tañca daṇḍo, dhavalo, pacanaṁ, citto,
anya-e0807n2:164_1: goti dabba+guṇa+kriyā+nāma+jātibhedena pañcavidhampi kamma+kattādivasena chabbidhaṁ, taṁ sattikārakaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:164_2: tadādhārabhūtadabbādayo tatraṭṭhakārakaṁ, na mukhyato. Mukhyato ce honti,
anya-e0807n2:164_3: tesaṁ sattidabbānaṁ aññamaññabyāvaṭarūpattā yo ādhāro, so ādhāroyeva,
anya-e0807n2:164_4: kismiñcikāle karaṇaṁ vā katturūpabhūto vā na hoti, tasmā thāli pacati, thāliyā pacati,
anya-e0807n2:164_5: thāliyaṁ pacatītyādinā ekassa vatthuno kattu+karaṇā+dhārabhedo na siyā.
anya-e0807n2:164_6: Sattipakkhe pana dabbādīnaṁ anekasattiyā ādhārattā sattiyā dabbādayo vivakkhitā taṁ taṁ kārakaṁ hotīti dabbādīnaṁ abhedepi kārakabhedo yujjate. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n2:167_0: Thāli vatthuto ekā cedapi sattikārakabhūtakattu+karaṇā+dhārādīnaṁ bhedena bheda+mupayāti,
anya-e0807n2:167_1: kimiva rāma+rāvaṇādivesadhārīnaṭako tesaṁ nāmavasena rāmo, rāvaṇoti bheda+mupayāti, ta+mivāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n2:171_2: te ca kathaṁ kriyāya kārakā honti.
anya-e0807n2:171_3: Kattā attanā patiṭṭhitāya hasati+naccaticcādikriyāya nimittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0807n2:171_4: Kammañca attanā patiṭṭhitakriyāya tadatthabhūtaindhanādīni pavattentaṁ ‘‘odanaṁ pacatī’’tyādo nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_5: ‘Kaṭṭhehi paccatī’tyādo kaṭṭhāni jalanakriyāya sādhetabbapākassa aṅgabhāvena nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_6: ‘Pharasunā chindatī’tyādo pharasu ca kaṭṭhānaṁ dvidhāpavattiyā nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_7: Kammañca kriyāya sambandhīyamānabyāpye sati nimittabhāvena kriyāya nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_8: Tathā sampadānā+vadhi+ādhārānaṁ ‘gāvo dadāti’ ‘gāmasmā apanayati’ ‘thāliyaṁ pacatī’tyādīsu godānā+panayana+pacanakriyānaṁ nimittattā kriyāya nimittāni honti.
anya-e0807n2:171_10: tasmā sa eva padhāno kattāti vohāraṁ labhati,
anya-e0807n2:171_11: aññesaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ kattubhāve satipi appadhānattā taṁ na labhati.
anya-e0807n2:174_0: Ekassa kattuno eva, sabbesaṁ kattutaṁ vinā.
anya-e0807n2:176_0: Karaṇādīnaṁ abhāvattā, kārakaṁ na hi chabbidhanti.
anya-e0807n2:180_0: Etaṁ sabhāvato upalabbhamānaṁ karaṇādīsu kattuttaṁ paresaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ jalana+dhāraṇādikriyāya aṅgaṁ upāyati appadhānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n2:182_0: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṁ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0807n2:183_0: Karaṇaṁ duvidhaṁ hoti, sampadānaṁ tidhā mataṁ;
